t:
I looked through the gallery for old photos of me and my sister, looking for something to put up as a birthday status.


I found a third child in all the pictures, from childhood to the ones taken a few days
back – but I don't
recognize her.
c:
When I scrolled back and looked again, I couldn't find my sister in the pictures anymore – only me and that other child.



#birthday #gallery #picture #sister #thirdperson #unrecognized #haunting #search
